long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Main features:
- Manage your CRM without leaving Gmail
- Customize your workflow by creating unlimited custom fields for each pipeline
- Export your pipeline data at CSV anytime
- Collaborate with your team


How Does Teamopipe compare with other Gmail CRM systems?

Streak CRM: First Gmail CRM that pioneered this type of systems, has become too expensive lately.

Pipedrive CRM: Discontinued its Gmail integration and can only be used from a standalone app.

Nethunt CRM: Integrates with many platforms but, does not offer a free plan.

To install, click the "Add to Chrome" button, return to your Gmail, and simply reload the page to start using the app!
